meaningMnemonic: You want to share <radical>happiness</radical> with people so you <radical>stamp</radical> <radical>stool</radical>s with the <kanji>news</kanji>. Now when people want a <kanji>report</kanji> of all the happy things going on, they can just look down before they sit.
readingMnemonic: You research and <kanji>report</kanji> the <kanji>news</kanji> from <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう). Only after, once all of the news is stamped onto the stools, do you leave your home.
